title: Textile, ca. 1800
medium:
Medum: cotton
Technique: block printed (two reds, purple, black, yellow-green) with yellow and blue applied by brush on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 12 x 39 cm (4 3/4 x 15 3/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 8 x 44.5 cm (3 1/8 x 17 1/2 in.)
Repeat H (half-drop): 24 cm (9 7/16 in.)
description: Small scale floral pattern in multi- color on drab background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medum: cotton
Technique: block printed (two reds, purple, black, yellow-green) with yellow and blue applied by brush on plain weave. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-122-a,b.
